com.vectorprint.report.itext

Interface LayerManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatamappingProcessor, ElementProducer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatamappingProcessor, BaseReportGenerator, DefaultElementProducer

    public interface LayerManager
    This interface facilitates grouping parts of reports together in logical layers, identified by a name.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfLayer initLayerGroup(String layerId, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas)
      initialize a layer, whose purpose is to contain child layers added by startLayerInGroup(java.lang.String, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte).
      com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfLayer startLayerInGroup(String groupId, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas)
      begin a child layer in the parent layer identified by groupId.

    • Method Detail

      • initLayerGroup

        com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfLayer initLayerGroup(String layerId,
                                            com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas)
        initialize a layer, whose purpose is to contain child layers added by startLayerInGroup(java.lang.String, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte). It is suggested to begin and end the layer in this method, without adding content to it
        Parameters:
        layerId -
        canvas -
        Returns:

      • startLayerInGroup

        com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfLayer startLayerInGroup(String groupId,
                                               com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas)
        begin a child layer in the parent layer identified by groupId. After adding content the layer should be ended.
        Parameters:
        groupId -
        canvas -
        Returns:
